Articles.Content:
Hey guys, I just wanted to show you this small shuttle i made for fun. It is able to get into a 100 kerbin orbit without the help of any other tanks. It has 1 stage, the first one are the main rockets just so you can have extra fuel, and the second one i the actual thing. It manouvers fairly well and im quite happy with it so i decided to share it with you all. So here it is:

Im leaving you guys the VAB craft file and the SPH one:

VAB:http://www./?rthuc5b0s5qad96

SPH:http://www./?69fr0b2m2i48i4t

Remember to comment so i know what i can improve on! Thanks!
Looking cool with one stage and all!
